title: Coronavirus Updates - America's Vaccine Rollout Chaos & International Pandemic News
itunes:title: Coronavirus Updates - America's Vaccine Rollout Chaos & International Pandemic News
description:
Coronavirus vaccination in the U.S. is plagued by chaotic distribution, a cat's birthday party leads to a COVID-19 outbreak in Chile, and China uses anal swabs to test for the virus.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
